Text.val: Author: Peter van der Veen; created 17.07.2001
24.10.2014 SH SCR19259 BPH224C Auto. batches: Added test BTCH_TOTABATCHH = BTCH_TOTAPAYMENTSHANDLEDH to start BPH250, else
BTCH_STATUS is set to 0 and BPH250 is not called
04.07.2014 SH SCR19007 BPH224A Added new TMPJ fields to store TMPL for desktop/batches
29.04.2013 JH SCR18105 Removed external flag
02.05.2011 JOH SCR16385 Replaced GNRL_CURRENCY by ADMN_CURRENCY and GB002 by GB902
19.11.2010 SH SCR15987 BPH224A Added BPH130.PI.BTCH_ID
07.09.2010 SH SCR15778 BPH224A Added module to check/book differences and cross administration bookings
13.07.2010 SH SCR15586 BPH224D Added test on BADP to submit BPH230 only if BADP rows exists which are not yet already booked
01.07.2010 GB SCR15540 Replacement calls the BMQ001 by the BMQ005
24.06.2010 GB SCR15612 Added update the TMPJ_AMOUNTEXCHDIFFERENCE
26.06.2006 JJ SCR 1509 BPH225A , ledger number eschange differences
05.01.2006 SH SCR9968 BPH224B Extended test to write 1. MQ with " or BADT_BALLASTDAILYSTATEMENT <> 0 and BNKA_NEWBALANCE = 0"
29.12.2005 SH SCR9923 BPH224A Changed update of TMPL_BOOKINDIVIDUAL for TMPL row if TMPJ_AMOUNTBATCHES <> 0
19.12.2005 SH SCR9834 BPH224A Changed structure to store additional TMPL rows
see task "BPH 224A Store add TEMP rows" to allow stroing of TMPL for
exchange differences (TMPJ_AMOUNTEXCHDIFFERENCE)
19.10.2005 SH SCR9152 BPH224C Added new part to handled manual batches with BPH250
01.09.2005 SH SCR8211 BPH224A The TMPJ updates are performed now independently from BNKA_CODETYPEACCOUNT
30.06.2005 SH SCR8462 BPH224A Added test on BNKA_CODETYPEACCOUNT <> 5
to perform module, has not to be performed for direct payments (CodeTypeAcc = 5)
02.05.2005 SH SCR8197 BPH224B Added call of BPH404
26.04.2005 SH SCR8163 BPH224B Added new test if account-statement is missing or is a new account
02.09.2004 SH SCR6953 BPH224A Store 1. TMPL --> Set TMPL_BOOKINDIVIDUAL = 'Y'
20.08.2004 SH SCR6809 Added new para PO.BADT_MUTDAILYSTATEMENTH will be updated
with PI.BADT_MUTDAILYSTATEMENT ==> BADT_BANK_CURRENCY -> GNRL_CURRENCY
18.12.2003 SH SCR5070 Added TMPL_BOOKINGDATE, init = BADT_DATDAILYSTATEMENT
29.09.2003 RR SCR4421 Store new row in BADT if po.LGCH > 0
20.06.2003 SH SCR3641 BPH224B Split message for MQ in two parts with UFB561
14/15.05.2003 JJ SCR3448 new TMPL_DESCRIPTIONS
18.02.2003 JJ SCR2988 additional inits TMPL
05.02.2003 SCR2931 SH Call BPH107 at the end of this program and also a new row has to stored to BDTL
17.12.2002 SCR2703 SH set TMPL_BOOKINDIVIDUAL = true in the second stored TMPL row (TMPJ_AMOUNTDESKTOP)
23.09.2002 SCR2198 SH Diff. changes for storing TMPL rows
02.09.2002 SCR1069 SH Store first TMPL row only if BADT_MUTDAILYSTATEMENT <> 0 and then also some updates were changed
29-08-2002 JP change some updates in 224B due to SCR #2004
17.07.2002 SCR1691 SH Add new parameter "PI.BADT_DAILYRUNNUMBER" used as
- argument to call BPH230 (Obtain table BADT with primary key)
25.03.2002 SH Converted arguments to alphanumeric if BPH230 will be called,
- because BPH230 called as submit serverjob by #GB701
21.03.2002 SH Call BPH250 as submit job use #GB701
21.03.2002 SH dif. changes according to new SPECS
07.03.2002 JJ SCR957 Implemented new fields TMPL
-- SCR#764 06.02.2002 SH (The BNKA_NEWBALANACE was updated
with BANK_NEWBALNCE + PI.BADT_MUTDAILYSTATEMENT
not with BNKA_NEBALANCE + PI.BADT_MUTDAILYSTATEMENT
The TYPE of PI.BADT_MUTDAILYSTATEMENT also changed
from BADP ID (18) into AMOUNT (114)
-- SCR#920 26.02.2002 SH (BPH224E, the BADT_RUNNUMBER was not reset to 0
after the BADT-row was handled, now it works correctly)
-- Desktop administration
-- Batches
-- Rounding differences
--Exchange differences NL
-- BPH 224A Store TEMP_LEDGER
(Module has not to be performed for direct payments (CodeTypeAccount = 5))
// BPH 224 E Final updates
... set PO.BADT_MUTDAILYSTATEMENTSH
... to avoid restart problems
after this we return to BPH 223 X and back to BPH 220 where the
transaction started...
-- BPH 224A Store TEMP_LEDGER
(Module has not to be performed for direct payments (CodeTypeAccount = 5))
-- TMPL row for "Desktop administration"
-- TMPL row for "Batches"
-- TMPL row for "exchagne differences"
-- TMPL row for "Rounding differences"
... Update TEMP_JOBSTATUS ( although it's a part of BPH224A, the TMPJ
fields have to be reset, independently form BNKA_CODETYPEACCOUNT)
// BPH 224 B Update BANKACCOUNT
// BPH 224 C Handle batches (BPH 250 )
... for automatic batches
... for manual batches
// BPH 224 D Test if all payments are handled (BPH 230 )
-- Submit Serverjob BPH230 (only if remaining BADP rows exists, which are not
already booked in the previous BPH220 modules)
-- Uses in T.S.
... condition to perform BPH224A
-- need to build ledger totals

SQL_STMT_U.val: select TMPL_ADMNO, cast(sum(TMPL_AMOUNTDEBITH - TMPL_AMOUNTCREDITH) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/TMPL where TMPL_RUNNUMBER = :2 group by TMPL_ADMNO order by TMPL_ADMNO for fetch only

Text.val: 1. Message: problem with the bank
2. Message: problem with the bank
//update if BADT_BALDAILYSTATEMENT <> 0
//update if BADT_BALDAILYSTATEMENT = 0
-- All payments were booked automatically, start final booking with BPH250
